# [COMMUNITY NAME] Pet Policy

**Effective Date:** [DATE]
**Last Updated:** [DATE]

---

## Overview

This document outlines the pet policies for [COMMUNITY NAME] in accordance with the Declaration of Covenants, Conditions, and Restrictions (CC&Rs) and community rules.

---

## Permitted Pets

### Allowed Animals
- Dogs (domestic breeds)
- Cats (domestic)
- Small caged animals (hamsters, gerbils, rabbits)
- Fish (aquariums)
- Birds (non-exotic, caged)

### Prohibited Animals
- Exotic animals (snakes, reptiles, etc.)
- Farm animals (chickens, goats, pigs, etc.)
- Wild animals
- Any animal deemed dangerous by local authorities

---

## Pet Limits

- Maximum of [NUMBER] pets per household
- Combined total of [NUMBER] dogs and cats
- [WEIGHT LIMIT] maximum weight per dog (if applicable)

---

## Leash Requirements

- All dogs must be on a leash no longer than [6 FEET] when outside the owner's property
- Pets must be under the control of a responsible person at all times
- Retractable leashes must be locked at [6 FEET] maximum in common areas

---

## Waste Removal

- Pet owners MUST immediately clean up after their pets
- Waste must be properly disposed of in designated trash receptacles
- Pet waste stations are located at: [LOCATIONS]
- Failure to clean up pet waste may result in fines

---

## Noise and Nuisance

- Excessive barking or noise is prohibited
- Pets causing a nuisance to neighbors may result in violation notices
- Three or more complaints may require removal of the pet from the community

---

## Registration Requirements

- All pets must be registered with the management company
- Provide proof of current vaccinations (rabies, distemper)
- Update registration if pet changes

---

## Common Area Restrictions

- Pets are NOT allowed in: [POOL AREA, CLUBHOUSE, PLAYGROUND]
- Pets ARE allowed in: [TRAILS, PARKS, DESIGNATED PET AREAS]
- Service animals are exempt from common area restrictions

---

## Breed Restrictions

[OPTION 1 - No Restrictions:]
This community does not maintain breed-specific restrictions. All dogs are welcome regardless of breed.

[OPTION 2 - With Restrictions:]
The following breeds are restricted and require additional liability insurance:
- [BREED 1]
- [BREED 2]
- [BREED 3]

---

## Insurance Requirements

- Pet owners are responsible for any damage caused by their pets
- [IF APPLICABLE: Owners of restricted breeds must maintain $[AMOUNT] liability insurance]

---

## Violation Process

| Offense | Action |
|---------|--------|
| First Violation | Written warning |
| Second Violation | $[AMOUNT] fine |
| Third Violation | $[AMOUNT] fine + board hearing |
| Continued Violations | May require pet removal |
